scripts.build: npm run build:sidecar -- --release && tsc && vite build
scripts.version: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const c=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./src-tauri/tauri.conf.json')); c.version=process.env.npm_package_version; fs.writeFileSync('./src-tauri/tauri.conf.json', JSON.stringify(c, null, 2));" && git add src-tauri/tauri.conf.json
